text: Step 6 BN left right v v - (00086 A i 1 def partition(nums, left, right): gy i, j = left, right # Bl nums[left] NEEH while i < j: while i < j and nums[j] >= nums[left]l: # MARERENM FEERNTE j =1 while i < j and nums[i] <= nums[left]l: # MEBGREIATFEERNTE i+=1 nums[il, nums[j] = nums[j], nums[i] # XN TR nums[i], nums[left] = nums[left], nums[i] # BEAEBRERNFRANS RE return i # BREEERIERS| . hello-algo. com
